select min(price) from goods_sku where spu_id = #{id}

SELECT CONCAT('促销：','满',di.condition_amount,'减',di.deduction_amount) promotion FROM goods_spu spu LEFT JOIN division_spu dis ON spu.id = dis.goods_id LEFT JOIN divisions di ON dis.division_id = di.division_id where di.open_reduction = 1 and (now() BETWEEN di.start_time and di.end_time) and spu.id = #{id}
